summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsThe Double Vita Capsule Cleansing Foam from Neogen is formulated with Double Vita capsule beads and a gel formula that provides smooth and radiant skin texture.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight, mildly acidic gel cleanser with a gentle formula that effectively cleanses while leaving skin feeling fresh and balancedGentle gel cleansing foam that brightens dull skin and delivers deep hydration for a soft, radiant complexionKey IngredientsAHA - Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesBHA - Controls excess sebum and combats uneven skin tonePapaya Enzyme - Gently removes dead skin cells, unclog pores, and helps reduce inflammationItem 2645132How To UseLather up an appropriate with damp hands and massage on face. Rinse off with lukewarm water.IngredientsWater, Lauryl Hydroxysultaine, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Sodium Chloride, Acrylates Copolymer, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Potassium Cocoate, C12-14 Alketh-12, Fragrance, Mannitol, Potassium Benzoate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Limonene, Hexylene Glycol, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzyl Benzoate, Glycerin, Linalool, Mica, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylene Glycol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Citric Acid, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Adenosine, Citral, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, CI 77492 (Iron Oxides, Yellow), CI 77491 (Iron Oxides, Red), Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Fruit Extract, Salicylic Acid, Citrus Junos Fruit Extract, Calcium Pantothenate, Maltodextrin, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Papain, Citronellol, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Glucose, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pyridoxine HCl, Xanthan Gum, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Panthenol, Caprylyl Glycol, Glutathione, Geraniol, Arbutin, Tranexamic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Biotin, Pyridoxine, Folic Acid, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Cyanocobalamin, Tocopherol, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Riboflavin, Thiamine HCl, Linoleic Acid, Beta-Carotene, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Lather up an appropriate with damp hands and massage on face. Rinse off with lukewarm water.
